  I want to checkout my cart
  So that I can place an order

steps.name: I click "Proceed To Checkout" button
I click "Register / Login" button
I register a new account
I click "Cart" button
I click "Proceed To Checkout" button
I should see my address details
I should see my order details
I enter description in comment text area
I click "Place Order" button
I enter payment details
I click "Pay and Confirm Order" button

name: Checkout Process

description:
As a registered user
  I want to log in to the website
  So that I can access my account

elements.name: Login with correct credentials

steps.name: I am on the home page
I click on the "Signup / Login" button
I should see "Login to your account" section
I enter correct email and password
I click the "Login" button
I should see "Logged in as" with my username

elements.name: Login with incorrect credentials

steps.name: I am on the home page
I click on the "Signup / Login" button
I should see "Login to your account" section
I enter incorrect email and password
I click the "Login" button
I should see "Your email or password is incorrect!" error message

elements.name: Logout User

steps.name: I am logged in to the website
I click on the "Logout" button
I should be redirected to the login page
I should not see "Logged in as" with my username

name: User Login
